agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Environmental Regulation TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Wednesday, March 13, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. J. M. Lozano The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 1649 Kuempel Relating to vehicle eligibility for the light-duty motor vehicle purchase or lease incentive program. HB 286 Thompson, Ed Relating to promotion of the use of recyclable materials as feedstock for manufacturing. HB 1212 Israel Relating to the modification or reprogramming of the exhaust emission system of a diesel-powered motor vehicle to emit soot, smoke, or other particulate matter. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 1747 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
